participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and nurturing, enjoys sharing knowledge with others.
participant_1.background: i'm partly deaf. i grow roses in my garden. i've a big library at home. i am a museum tour guide. i love to drink fancy tea.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: adventurous and inquisitive, always looking to learn new things.
participant_2.background: i am an avid kayaker. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. i am also a graduate student. my parents taught me survival skills.
